headline: Ask HN: Curious about Ansible but afraid or blocked on getting started?
description:
Are you curious about Ansible [0] for your CM, IaC needs but afraid or blocked on getting started?

1. What are some of the blockers 2. What will (significantly) improve for you if you became proficient in Ansible? 3. Are there some things that you just can't do right not but would be easuer if you became proficient in Ansible?

[0] https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ansible_(software)
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 对Ansible感到好奇，但又害怕或受阻于起步阶段？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 對Ansible感到好奇，但又害怕或受阻於起步階段？
description_zh-Hans:
你是否对Ansible[0]满足你的CM、IaC需求感到好奇，但又害怕或阻挠开始使用？

1. 有哪些阻碍因素？ 2. 如果你能熟练掌握Ansible，对你来说，什么会有（明显的）改善？ 3.

[0] https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ansible_(软件)
description_zh-Hant:
你是否對Ansible[0]滿足你的CM、IaC需求感到好奇，但又害怕或阻撓開始使用？

1. 有哪些阻礙因素？ 2. 如果你能熟練掌握Ansible，對你來說，什麼會有（明顯的）改善？ 3.

[0] https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ansible_(軟件)
